DOC.brief_summary: To determine activity response rate AG-013736 patient advance refractory renal cell cancer , ( patient also fail sorafenib-based therapy ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of AG-013736 In Patients With Refractory Metastatic Renal Cell Cancer
DOC.criteria: RCC metastases nephrectomy failure prior sorafenibbased therapy least 1 target lesion irradiated adequate bone marrow , hepatic renal function , > equal 18 year age .
